Description_lang: Increases your chance to dodge melee and ranged attacks by $s1%, and your movement speed by $s2%.

description_blz.en_US: Increases your chance to dodge melee and ranged attacks by 2%, and your movement speed by 2%.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta un 2% tu probabilidad de esquivar ataques cuerpo a cuerpo y ataques a distancia, y 2% tu velocidad de movimiento.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 2% sua chance de se esquivar de ataques corpo a corpo e de longa distância e em 2% a sua velocidade de movimento.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht Eure Chance, Nahkampf- und Distanzangriffen auszuweichen, um 2% und Eure Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit um 2%.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases your chance to dodge melee and ranged attacks by 2%, and your movement speed by 2%.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta tu probabilidad de esquivar ataques cuerpo a cuerpo y a distancia un 2%, y tu velocidad de movimiento un 2%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente vos chances d’esquiver les attaques de mêlée et à distance de 2%, et votre vitesse de déplacement de 2%.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la probabilità di schivata degli attacchi in mischia e a distanza del 2% e la velocità di movimento del 2%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Повышает вероятность уклонения от атаки в ближнем и дальнем бою на 2%, а скорость передвижения – на 2%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 근접 및 원거리 공격을 회피할 확률이 2%만큼, 이동 속도가 2%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你閃躲近戰和遠程攻擊的機率提高2%，移動速度提高2%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你对近战和远程攻击的躲闪几率提高2%，移动速度提高2%。
